website_summaries.verdict: A hot and potentially powerful handheld steam cleaner that features a variety of attachments.
pros: The Sienna Birdie has 6 different attachments that facilitate powerful cleaning in a number of situations
The smaller water tank, which helps keep the unit lightweight, can be refilled while the steam cleaner is in use, so there is no downtime when working
cons: The thumb-pump trigger requires a bit of effort and may quickly fatigue some users

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is powerful! I had recently tried a different steam cleaner on Amazon that was not strong enough to clean practically anything and put no pressure out. This one, however is awesome. The handle comfortable and the ability to fill it without having to wait 5 or more minutes of cooling down makes it so much more useful. It gets up to temp quick and has tons of pressure (you pump with the handle) to knock out serious stains and grime.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Ullrich

customer_reviews.title: Steam Cleaning for the win!
customer_reviews.text: The Sienna Steam Birdie is not only a powerful steam cleaner but is easy to use and gets the job done. I have used the Sienna Birdie to clean a variety of things in my home and I was amazed by the power of it and the quick heat up. Fill it up with water using the built in measuring cup, attach your cleaning accessory, plug it in and you are ready to go. I especially like the extra long power cord and the steam cleaning accessories that came with it. This is a great steam clearer to use all around your home!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat well.
customer_reviews.text: The product did not heat up enough. I could aim steam at my hand with no problem. Used to clean tiles and shower. Also used in kitchen backsplash and stove. Just wets everything. Not enough heat to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Berrios

customer_reviews.title: How to clean with steam
customer_reviews.text: It's real hot and I loved the glass cleaning and steaming my pillows
customer_reviews.author: Ida Mason

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it works but not very effectively. It can help a bit but it doesn’t work with tough stain. It’s already broken after 2 uses, I cannot use the long tube anymore. It’s too heavy so it’s not easy to do cleaning when holding it. You will get your hands tired very quickly, not a smart design.
customer_reviews.author: iris b.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and love the ability to refill without waiting for cool down
customer_reviews.text: Heats quickly. Can refill as needed. All steamers have small water tank capacity and need to be refilled often, so this is a great plus. You do need to press and pump the button, but requires no more effort than holding a button down to release steam on other steamers. They also require pauses to rebuild steam and pressure, so no difference there. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Bookdragon Gal

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, until it began leaking.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first few uses, then the nozzles seemed to not attach quite right and now it leaks water from the connection point whenever I try to use it. I had to DIY a solution and use superglue and duct tape to permanently affix one attachement nozzle just so I would get my hands burned or sprayed with scalding steam. I wish it had a bigger water reservoir too, seems as if I’m constantly refining it just to defrost a 2sq. Ft. Freeezer
customer_reviews.author: Anagram17

customer_reviews.title: Very handy in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews state the steam is not continous, or the tip attachments do not work. Please read the discription befor purchasing. Everything works fine for me. I like this product. The discription tells you it is a steam pump and not a continous supply of steam. Follow the instructions, and it is a good cleaning tool.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rosson

customer_reviews.title: Short n sweet
customer_reviews.text: What I like is the fast start up and being able to refill instantly with no waiting. But I don't like the extremely short steam time I also recommend a locking button as my hand cramps bad with this. Hard to get work done stopping alot I will be looking for something a bit longer lasting
customer_reviews.author: Rossel

customer_reviews.title: Leaks water
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight steamer would of been better if it didn’t leak water . Definitely couldn’t use it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Our only complaint is it’s be nice if there was a carrying strap so we can use both hands to clean (one for holding the hose and the other to run a cloth over what we’re cleaning). Otherwise it’s a wonderful product that makes cleaning a lot easier, we’ve been finding odd little projects to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. No issues, no meltings, its steam and plenty hot. All of this despite other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: jmatejovsky

customer_reviews.title: Does not release steam continously
customer_reviews.text: Besides the fact that you have to continue to pump the handle to get any steam out it just doesn't cut it. I wanted it mainly for the stuck on stuff from my oven glass door, it did nothing. Tried to use it in an investment property to clean the bathrooms but I still had to scrub everything.
customer_reviews.author: stacey a mefford

customer_reviews.title: Good product and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The steamer is quick to produce steam and very easy to use. Very good value. But it can be used for light duty cleaning. If you want to use it for large area and very dirty carpet cleaning, it may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: xumamazon

customer_reviews.title: Small and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little steamer. I have been loving all the things I can clean with this!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Stidham

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd steamer, I like the feature of refilling without letting it cool down by unplugging it. I use it for all cleaning, it cuts cleaning time because you don't have to scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!! I pack it up and sent it back!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product at all. I tried it and immediately packed it up and sent it back!!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Too much trouble using this product.
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I do not like about this product is that you have to hold it in one hand and use the hose with your other hand, then you have to put the steamer down to wipe up what you have steamed. I think it does an okay job, but I regret buying it. Too much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle112159

customer_reviews.title: Amazing priced product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer because my neighboring apartment got bed bugs (which she decided not to say anything) well guess where they came to?! I have been using it on stuffed animals (that won't fit in the dryer) and my couch/loveseat. My only complaint is the difficulty attaching the attachments. Other then that I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hutzell

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the pump action. Seems to give me the powerful blast of steam to clean. Cleaning is very good with stains on upholstery. Cleaned my whole bathroom and worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it once and it didn't get very hot but maybe I didn't know what I was doing. Looks great thought and all the parts were there and very easy to figure out and use.
customer_reviews.author: Claire G. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot enough to really clean.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! With cold and flu season here I've been able to disinfect most hard surfaces. Makes cleaning windows and sliders a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Arrietta Green

customer_reviews.title: Not a good steamer
customer_reviews.text: I used the steamer for cleaning our large bathroom & had been using a shark handheld steamer which I was very satisfied until it stopped working after about 6 years. Could not get another shark so went to Amazon & purchased the Sienna.
customer_reviews.author: JEANNE

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what i was hoping
customer_reviews.text: I'm having to pump more than I think you are supposed to for the steam to be strong. Also water tank is small. Having to refill so often can't finish an area before stopping to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S.

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull
customer_reviews.text: I like the power of the steamer and I also like that I'm able to see the water level these are two of the most important factors with making my choice on this steamer and I was not disappointed,
customer_reviews.author: Resa J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Duplicate order
customer_reviews.text: Received duplicate order, that is why one Sienna Steam Birdie Handheld Steam Cleaner was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Tague

customer_reviews.title: Bad Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this item for purchase. The steam pressure is low.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: WHY "L" WONT ATTACH it willnot go far enough to lock in place
customer_reviews.text: I CAN NOT GET ITEM "L" TO ATTACH TO ITEM "E" IT SEEMS THAT ITEM "L" IS NOT DEEP ENOUGH ON THE INSIDE i received a new hose and it is worse than the original if you would please send me another steamer and a shipping label and i will return the original one thanks Ronald Buchanan 710 DOUG ST ROXBORO,N.C. 27573 PHONE # 336-592-1456
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. I was expecting to have steam once I press the lever. Steam does not flow properly. Only small bursts of steam at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Glen G.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much !!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much !!! amazing product , good work,I am happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer March 27 it is broken already the steam came out of the back handle and burnt my hand I will return it
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn guarino

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Returned this handheld steamer without opening after reading the negative reviews. So glad I never even opened it. Really appreciated the honest reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Jay Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Birdie steamer is great
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy steamer. I used it in multiple spots and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Erica cartman

customer_reviews.title: No dirtee birdee around here!
customer_reviews.text: My wife says that it cuts throught the desert grime of Arizona better than any steamer she has ever used! She particularly likes the pump feature.
customer_reviews.author: mrcegjr

customer_reviews.title: It's...ok
customer_reviews.text: I like how quickly it heats up and does the job. It can't quite reach all the areas needed though. Plus to be constantly squeezing the handle is annoying. I just moved and the window tracks need alot of cleaning. My hands were aching after 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Adams

customer_reviews.title: A little steam goes a long way.....
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t quite steam grease and grime off, but it does soften it up enough, where with a little elbow grease, the mess cleans up easier. For left on refrigerator spills, it definitely helps, where mold is concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Panzo

customer_reviews.title: Great medium duty home multi purpose steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as powerful as I anticipated, but once you figure its capabilities....it will be great to keep things spick and span
customer_reviews.author: ERIC  MURRAY

customer_reviews.title: From 1 to 10 I’ll give it a 5
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I have to pump it but I like that you can use it seconds after pluging it in
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Well But Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: This worked well however it broke after using it only 3 times. It started leaking from the bottom and is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love My Steamer
customer_reviews.text: My steamer works great. I love it. But, make sure you unplug it before switching heads. It's hot and it burns.
customer_reviews.author: karan k orth

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Performs as advertised. Good value. Puts out more steam than I anticipated. Good for cleaning hard water deposits around sinks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: del nickell

customer_reviews.title: You will love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this handheld steam cleaner. I have been using it all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey andrus

customer_reviews.title: Steamer cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Hatted it did not reach very face spit water more than steamed
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good steam action.
customer_reviews.text: This gives off a fair amount of powerful steam. Will use for deep cleaning in the kitchen and bathroom. Probably works great on car tires, too.
customer_reviews.author: jazzfan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So simple to use and deep cleaned my bathroom like nothing before! Now onto the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: mpsrh

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It takes a long time to heat up and when it does you have to spray and wait some more. Does not let you to continue spraying
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It's okayyy honestly doesn't clean as well as I thought it would doesn't replace any cleaning products as far as I'm concerned 🤷
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: as soon as i pressed the lever the steam started and the nozzle keeps blowing off the piece of crap . i waited for this junk phew what a waste
customer_reviews.author: helen luick

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: Great to clean bathrooms, kitchen sinks, etc without harmful chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price:
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for my my needs. It works great: Happy Me 😻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I’ve used it all around my home and it feels so much cleaner! Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Peters

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Its light weight and easy to use even in a hurry..thanks for your product..
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Accessories Don’t Fit
customer_reviews.text: I never used the steamer because the hose wouldn’t fit steaming unit.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jones

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: I would order this product again, it worked as predicted,without problems
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Nice little streamer for the money!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a nice little steamer. There are a few things that could be improved like some leakage and a little bigger tank, but overall i love it! I have thoroughly cleaned all of my beds, living room furniture, curtains, throw pillows etc. And I'm just getting started. I'm very pleased with it. One gripe is that the bendable attachment is difficult to work with. Other than that, 5 stars from me. And it's definitely portable for travel or on the go. I will definitely recommend to family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gadget
customer_reviews.text: This awesome gadget did a fantastic job of melting the grease off the range hood and cleaning the exhaust fan, blasting the grime off the windowsills, cleaning my kitchen cabinets around the knobs, steam cleaning the kitchen floor, and removing grime from many cracks and crevices. Reviews of other such products have described tippiness, short cord, need for cool-down before refilling, short operation time, etc. No such problems with this dandy machine. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Andresen

customer_reviews.title: Must be careful in using hot steam.
customer_reviews.text: Dirt Blasters Carpet Cleaning used it for 100 fabric type Casino swivel stools for the filming of the series Ozark. It was used for the worst chairs with hot water extraction and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Needs more pressure.
customer_reviews.text: It needs more pressure. When I think of a steam cleaner, I think of a clean house, without having to scrub much, or use any chemicals. That is not the case with this steam cleaner. This will most likely stay in the closet. Note that this is my very first steam cleaner, and I'm not sure if my expectations are too high. I have not had the opportunity to compare this steam cleaner to others..
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend This Product
customer_reviews.text: I needed to use this item over the weekend and it provides great steam and is easy to use. It did have a piece broken that attaches the flexible hose to the unit, but since I wanted to use use it right away, I used it without the flexible hose and decided to keep the item. Having the use of the flexible hose would be nice for certain situations though, so will need to contact someone about getting the broken piece replaced. Otherwise, it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great little steamer! Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little steamer for the price! Puts out a ton of steam and if you follow directions it's awesome. The cord is pretty long and although it only holds around a cup of water, if you bring a water bottle with you where you're using it, it gets the job done well! You have to depress the back end of the spout to make steam and I found using my elbow worked great when I need both hands. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Villa

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess.  Still getting used to it
customer_reviews.text: Putting the attachments on is REALLY hard and tears at the plastic nubs. I'm actually afraid I'm going to wreck the product. It cleans fine...But the "pumping" action to get the pressure up is a little bit tedious. But again...It cleans well and is working as I need it to
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Fast heating, easy to use, works well
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a grungy rental house bathroom cleanup and wish I had ordered it before I had to clean the kitchen - it would have been a great help in there. Yuk! I think it will come in handy for occasional big cleaning jobs, probably not for everyday jobs but it works well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for assisting in cleaning my bird cage
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a bird cage with the seed catcher around it. This is a great tool for getting down in the catcher and loosening up food and bird poop. Make it easy to wipe out with wet wipes or damp cloth. Helps to disinfect while cleaning. Of course you make sure that the bird is not in the cage when you do this.
customer_reviews.author: sue b

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Just wish it had a bigger reservoir for the water. Removes mold and hard watery spots easily.
customer_reviews.author: V. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: STEAM CLEANER //
customer_reviews.text: NOT HOT ENOUGH / NOT REALLY A GOOD DESIGN NOT ENOUGH PRESSURE / NEVER BUY AGAIN //CHEAP MADE /NOT EVEN A GOOD PLASTIC /WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: jack tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t found a steamer yet that cleans as easily as they are reported to. This does well, but built-up scum on shower doors does not come off effortlessly. Couldn’t tell I’d used it.
customer_reviews.author: Candyce

customer_reviews.title: It does the scrubbing
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about this product as it does all the work. I do not have the strength to the hard scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Doles

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted steamer to clean off yucky places on front and back porch as well as around window frames. It works perfectly for these jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Only issue is to keep pumping
customer_reviews.author: Joemar R. Tolentino

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: Works well steams the paint right off the wall! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

product_meta.title: Sienna Steam Birdie Handheld Steam Cleaner | Multipurpose Portable Steamer with Hand Pump | for Kitchen, Bathroom, Stove Tops, Windows, Shower, Cars, Boats
product_meta.description:
Are you tackling home cleaning tasks with paper towels and spray bottles filled with disinfectants and chemicals? Do you procrastinate and avoid tough cleaning projects like mouldy shower doors or grimey ovens? You will absolutely marvel at how quickly and easily the power of steam can clean and sanitize, and you may even begin to enthusiastically plan for your next fun cleaning project!

 Have you added up the cost of all the different cleaning products you use for projects just inside your home? They add up quickly! Using the Sienna Steam Birdie frees you to toss away most of those products. Beside the initial purchase, the only cost for steam cleaning is for the water and electricity used to heat it. Eco-friendly steam cleaning will also save money by reducing allergies and stopping the spread of infection in the family. What could be more important?

 Kills Germs On Contact- The Sienna Birdie exterminates dust mites, bed bugs and bacteria that accumulate on pillows, mattresses and bedding without the use of chemicals and pollutants. A must-own for allergy sufferers!

 Ideal For Baby’s Room - A super safe solution for cleaning and sterilizing high chairs, cribs, diaper pails, and car seats. Great for stuffed animals and small toys that inevitably find their way into baby’s mouth.

 Versatile, Convenient Attachments - Includes a full set of 9 accessories for more targeted cleaning tasks.

 Why Choose Sienna?

 *  Easy to Use
 *  Compact and Portable
 *  Safe and Sanitary/No Chemicals/Eco-Friendly
 *  Unique Hand Pump/Ready In Seconds
 *  1500 Watts of Powerful Penetrating Steam
 *  Refills While Still In Use/No Cool Down Time Necessary
 *  Just Use Tap Water
 *  Weighs Less Than 5 lbs.
 *  Exterminates Bed Bugs And Dust Mites
 *  9 Convenient Attachments
feature_bullets: DELUXE, PORTABLE AND POWERFUL | Enjoy cleaning and sanitizing in one easy step! The Sienna Steam Birdie portable steamer is all you need to safely and effortlessly deep clean the most stubbornly soiled surfaces and hard-to-reach, awkward locations inside and outside your home.

HIGH TECH ENGINEERING PROVIDES ADVANCED FEATURES | Equipped with unique hand pump so you can begin steaming at 14.5 PSI of steam pressure in less than 30 seconds. Can be refilled while in use with no cool down time required - perfect for large jobs.

VERSATILE AND POWERFUL | Sienna’s steamer cleaner provides a simple and safe way to tackle every conceivable cleaning job including bathrooms, windows, hard floors, stoves and BBQs, fabrics, mattresses (kills bedbugs!) refrigerators, table tops, autos and boats, kids’ toys and pet areas.

SAFE, SANITARY, AND ECO-FRIENDLY | Sienna endorses and incorporates green technology in all its products. Steam Birdie cleans and sanitizes without the use of detergents, bleach, ammonia, or other toxic chemicals. Pets and small children will never breathe or ingest dangerous toxins.

PORTABILITY PLUS POWER | The Sienna Birdie hand steamer generates a massive 1500 Watts (43% more powerful than competing hand held steam cleaners) of high powered steam in seconds, yet has a compact, portable design and weighs less than 5 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars163 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
